text: @realDonaldTrump Call it coronavírus or covid19 or Sars-Cov-2. I wish the country had a leader like @NYGovCuomo that understands the threat and is man enough to own the required actions to protect Americans. Great leaders are revealed during a crisis and you’re weak it makes me worry for the USA.
